name: MY LAST BA 767 FLIGHT: One Last Ride on a British Airways Boeing 767
description:
Taking my last ever flight on a British Airways Boeing 767, the aircraft that got me into aviation and without which inflight Video would not exist.

I took a flight from Zurich to London Heathrow in Club Europe to say goodbye one last time, and raise a toast to the aircraft that means so much to me personally. 

SUPPORT US ON PATREON TO WATCH THIS FLIGHT IN FULL: patreon.com/inflightvideo

FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/inflightvideo
